Megatron:





Megatron glared down on the weapon. "I was thinking of another purpose of 
this weapon. You see, Rampage has rejected my advice to let me rule the 
Predacon as I always have. This could be very useful in gaining back my 
army. We should go there soon to Hell Beast's ship and claim it by force."

"But boss," Quickstrike objected. "We ain't all here."

Megatron turned his head and glowered at the little bot. "Then where are the 
others?"

>"It has been a while since you left cybertron, The weapon you hold is
>a new model Predacon Decimator rifle, it has single beam and pulse
>capabilities that can cut enemies like tin plate."
>Phobia knows Megatron expects nothing but the best. "In a raid on a
>Maximal settlement I hit a Maximal point blank. Their still scraping
>his inner circuitry off the wall. Under Predacon instruction of
>course." Step one, set the hook
>
>"Can you imagine the possibilities such a weapon could raise?" Phobia
>left the question open for the powerhungry tyrant to swallow. Step
>two, dangle the bait.
>
